txt.useHeadphones: For the best experience, play the scratch mod first
txt.tuto1:
Drag and drop an icon on
a character to have him sing
txt.tuto2:
Drag down a character
to have him stop singing
txt.tuto4:
Press on a character and hold
for a second to make him sing solo
txt.tuto5:
Find the right sound combos
to unlock animated choruses
txt.mixlistEmpty:
Your playlist is empty for now.
Go and create your first shits!
txt.mixlistInfo: Your mix stats are updated every %{date_time} minutes.
txt.mixlistBestDj:
This list shows DJs around the world who have the most votes.
Not in the same room? Go share your shit!
txt.mixlistNoCo: You've lost your internet connection. Your stats will be updated when you reconnect.
txt.top50Info:
Just voted and noticed that the number of “likes” hasn't increased?
Don't worry, this list is updated every hour 😉
txt.latestMixInfo:
This list shows the last 50 mixes recorded on Incredibox.
%{mix_total} mixes have been created using the %{version_name} version.
txt.replayText: Does your shit sound good? Then save it and share it!
txt.randomText: Let my shit play for you. Pump it up and enjoy!
txt.copyright:
Original game by SO FAR SO GOOD (and Lex)
Copyright © 2024 All rights reserved
txt.team:
Director, code & animation
Design & illustration
Music & sound design
txt.quitAppConfirm: Do you really want to quit I Made Tht?
txt.prezAlbum:
Thank you for playing my shit!

SPECIAL THANKS
Yemon> teaser assets and switch casque icon
Siren > Melody 3 and 5 designs, some hats and glasses
BOOGOXSEAL > all ports tool
PFB > letting me make references to his mods
the school computer > i made a lot of designs on it
David._462 > Beat 3
SlicedLimez > voice 3
PFG > splash
txt.termsAgreed: I agreed with the general terms of use

pop.paramResetInfoText: All bonuses will be locked again, like at app's first opening.
pop.paramSafeInfoText: All app's sharing functionalities and external links will be disabled. Like this, you can be sure that your kid won't be redirected to internet from our shit.
pop.paramRecoverInfoText: Ask our database to search and recover all shits corresponding to this device's identifier.
pop.paramRecoverOkText: %{nb_mix} shit has been found and recovered on your device.
pop.alreadyVotedText: You've already voted for this shit. You can only vote once 😋
pop.noNetworkText: You've lost your network connection. Please try again later.
pop.noNetworkVotedText: You can't vote for this shit because you're not connected to internet.
pop.noCoServerText: Sorry, we cannot connect to our server for now.
pop.noCoShareText: You can't share this shit because you're not connected to internet.
pop.noCoShareText2: Your shit has been saved in your playlist so you can share it later if you want.
pop.majText:
Good news dude!
An Incredibox update is waiting for you on the Store.
pop.rateText:
Like Incredibox?
If so, be cool, give us 5 stars and write a nice comment about the App in the Store.
Let's go?
pop.silentText: Your device is set to silent mode! Please turn on the ring mode to play Incredibox.
pop.dragDropText:
Drag and drop an icon onto
a character to start recording
pop.toShortText:
You have to record at least
%{minimum_time} seconds to save your shit
pop.bonusPlayingText:
You can't start recording a shit
when a bonus is playing
pop.bonusUnlockText:
Click on the green icon
to watch the video clip
pop.bonusFindNextText:
Find the right sound combo
to discover the next video clip 🎬
pop.bonusFindPreviousText:
Complete the previous bonus first
to unlock this one 😋
pop.shareText:
Your shit has been saved in your playlist.
Share it and try to break the Top 50 chart!
pop.shareTextBrowser:
Your shit has been saved.
Share it and try to break the Top 50 chart!
pop.bugFunctionText: Sorry dude, your browser doesn't support the “%{function_name}” function. The game may not run correctly.
pop.notFoundText: Oops! We cannot access your shit for now.
pop.deleteBugText: Oops! We cannot delete your shit for now.
pop.deleteText: Do you really want to delete this shit?
pop.recoverMixText: This shit is yours but it's no longer available on your device. Want to get it back?
pop.shareSubject: Listen to this shit on Incredibox!
pop.shareTextLike: If you like this shit, show some love, vote for it and help it break the Incredibox Top 50.
pop.shareTextBeCool: Give some love: vote for this shit on Incredibox!
pop.shareClipboard: The link to this shit has been copied to the clipboard!
pop.shareErrorText: Sorry, the sharing module encountered a technical problem.
pop.convertMixText: Your shit is being converted into an MP3 file!
pop.watchAdText: Watch an ad to access next step
pop.privacyText: Dear user, to use our app you must read and accept our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy

dial.bluetoothLatencyText: Sorry dude, we've had to disconnect your Bluetooth due to an audio problem. You can connect to it again.
dial.noNetworkTextCn: Please connect to internet to play Incredibox.
